title: New Secretaries appointed to Cabinet Ministries
body_lines: Letters of appointment to the new Secretaries appointed to the Cabinet Ministries were handed over by President Gotabaya Rajapaksa at the President’s House in Colombo yesterday.
The list of new Secretaries appointed to the Cabinet Ministries is as follows.
2. M.M.P.K. Mayadunne – Public Administration, Home Affairs, Provincial Councils and Local Government Ministry
3. K.D.S. Ruwanchandra – Ministry of Ports, Shipping and Aviation
4. S.T. Kodikara – Ministry of Trade, Commerce and Food Security
5. Wasantha Perera – Ministry of Justice, Prisons Affairs and Constitutional Reforms
12. Anuradha Wijekoon – Ministry of Sports and Youth Affairs
16. Somaratne Vidanapathirana – Ministry of Buddhasasana, Religious and Cultural Affairs
20. R.M.C.M. Herath – Ministry of Wildlife and Forest Resources Conservation
22. P.H.C. Ratnayake – Ministry of Urban Development and Housing
23. R.P.A. Wimalaweera – Ministry of Labour and Foreign Employment
